text: Hello Jane. Did your interview go ahead? If so, how did it go?  I assume you are now home as most schools have closed.  Take care of yourself and your family.  If you need to keep studying virtually, this blog on our website might be helpful. Take care and feel free to say hi if I can help you with anything at all.  Unique times. <https://www.accessvfx.org/blog/sun-loungers-on-the-beach-not-deckchairs-on-the-titanic-14-golden-tips-to-working-remotely-for-students>

Hi Lucy, thank you for checking up on me
my interview was 100% cancelled but currently I am uploading all my work online for a digital portfolio submission, I will tell you how the reviewing process goes as soon as it happens. 
You're correct, I am currently at home so I'll check the website out and continue to do work from where I am. Thank you for your continued support through this tough time, please continue to stay safe yourself :blush:
I assume you're working from home too?
